title: The Ultimate Stretching Routine After Any Workout (Post Workout Routine)
description:
Welcome to this ultimate stretching routine ideal post workout for example weight lifting, martial arts, running, surfing or really any other activity. Take the time to slow down after your training to shift into and activate a relaxed & digest state of the nervous system - the parasympathetic state. Do this after every training in a quiet spot. Rest well and grow stronger! Flo from Breathe and Flow is teaching this class.

🧘 Breathe and Flow membership platform (free 7 day trial!): https://practice.breatheandflow.yoga

00:00 Intro
01:20 Class

***

Breathe and Flow is a yoga and lifestyle channel owned by Bre and Flo Niedhammer. Knowing that the body benefits from movement while the mind benefits from stillness, we share our philosophy of mental stillness through the fluidity of a strong practice. Bre and Flo are Registered Yoga Teachers (RYT) with Yoga Alliance® holding the highest certifications as E-RYT500, and are also Yoga Alliance Continuing Education Providers (YACEP). Combined they are trained in Vinyasa yoga, Hatha yoga, Yin yoga, Myofascial Release (MFR), pre- and postnatal yoga, Functional Movement, Animal Flow, Kinstretch, Functional Range Conditioning (FRC) mobility training, Functional Range Assessment (FRA) and Anatomy Trains Structural. Bre and Flo have taught at several premium yoga studios for many years and are teaching their teacher trainings, retreats, and workshops around the world. They currently live in Las Vegas, Nevada, USA. Learn more about them and their certifications on their website: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/about

Our disclaimer: https://www.breatheandflow.yoga/disclaimer

New sportswear for jiu-jitsu, yoga, surfing, gym and all other activities: https://www.breatheandflow.org/shop

Take the time after any training/workout to stretch and cool down. This will help you grow stronger, recover better and feel great for the rest of the day! 🙏 Filmed at Xinalani Retreat Center, Mexico: https://bit.ly/3kjeTOy

Best stretching video I have ever followed after a workout. No music, birds tweet, and constant form corrections. You can even sense mindfulness. Grateful to have discovered this channel. Thank you for your efforts.
I'm amazed at the progress in my fitness journey ever since finding this channel and consistently practicing with both of you. As always, thank you all so much!

After years of body image issues and eating addiction, I took a long break from the gym. Today I had my first real workout since, trying to get back into routine. But this time, more healed, more present and as a unit instead of fighting against myself. This routine was exactly what I needed after my workout. Not only stretching but nice words too. Felt like a hug. Thank you! Will keep integrating your videos
